title: FeatherBoard变量无法使用
author: linmiao233
txt_content:
FeatherBoard的插件变量用不了，PlaceholderAPI的变量也是用不了
要怎么办？？？
FeatherBoard的只带服务器变量是可以用的，像那些其他插件的变量就用不了，如Vault。

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
FeatherBoard 用的是MVdW Placeholders 
变量列表
https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/mvdw-placeholders/
vault变量是有的  变量是   {money}
economy(top)
Description: Vault economy money placeholders
Link: http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/vault/

Placeholders
{money_formatted}
Vault economy money formatted
Returns: Text

{money}
Vault economy money
Returns: Number

{money_rounded}
Vault economy money rounded
Returns: Number复制代码
